participant_1.background:
I am a powerlifter who loves the cold.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
I went to the beach with my family and boyfriend last summer.
i have one grandson and one daughter.
i work in a circus as a juggler.

participant_2.background:
I built a detailed model of the Eiffel Tower last year.
twilight is my favorite book series.
I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right.
I work as a park ranger, which allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.
I'd love to learn more about my family history and where I come from.

content.text: Hi, what are you passionate about?
I am a park ranger and I love the outdoors!
That's awesome! I would love to be a park ranger but I'm not very outdoorsy.
It's not too late to learn! There are lots of resources available that can help you get outdoors more.
I know, I know. I've been meaning to get out and explore more. I just need to find the time.
There's always time for adventure! What kind of things are you interested in doing?
I'm not sure. I guess I'd like to go hiking and camping. Maybe fishing too.
Those are all great options! There are a lot of beautiful places to hike and camp in the United States.
I know, I've been wanting to go to Yellowstone for a while now.
Yellowstone is amazing! I went there a few years ago and it was incredible.
I'm jealous! I'm sure it was amazing.
It was! I'd love to go back someday.
Me too! Maybe we can go together sometime.
